name: Valda, Seismic Impact
functionalText:
Whenever an opponent draws 1 or more cards during an action phase, create that many Seismic Surge tokens.

At the start of your turn, if you control 3 or more Siesmic Surge tokens, cards you own with **crush** get **dominate** this turn.

name: High Riser
functionalText:
**Once per Turn Action** - {r}{r}{r}: **Attack**

If you've drawn a card this turn, this gets +1{p}.

name: Testament of Valahai
functionalText:
If you control three or more Seismic Surge tokens, this gets +2{d}. If you control six or more, instead this gets +4{d}.

name: Break Stature
functionalText: **Crush** - When this deals 4 or more damage to a hero, destroy an aura token they control. They can't create auras with that token's name until the end of their next turn.

name: Clash of Bravado
functionalText: When this defends, **clash** with the attacking hero. The winner destroys an aura the other hero controls.

name: Headbutt
functionalText:
This can't be defended by non-head equipment.

If you have a head equipped and the defending hero doesn't, this gets +1{p}.

**Crush** - When this deals 4 or more damage to a hero, put a -1{d} counter on a head they have equipped, then if it has 0{d}, destroy it.

name: Pec Perfect
functionalText: Whenever a card defends this, **clash** with the defending hero. The winner destroys the top card of the other hero's deck.

name: Put 'Em In Their Place
functionalText:
**Valda Specialization**

**Crush** - When this deals 4 or more damage to a hero, they discard their hand, then they draw that many cards.

name: Solid Ground
functionalText: This costs {r} less to play for each Seismic Surge you control.

functionalText:

name: Base of the Mountain
functionalText:

This card's {d} is equal to the number of action cards defending on the active chain link.
